title: quarkus update --stream=3.0 not working
body:
### Describe the bug

The quarkus CLI update command [quarkus update --stream=3.0]  does not appear to be working for me on a fresh install of a quarkus 2.16.6.Final app.  It says Failed to resolve version for io.quarkus:quarkus-update-recipes:jar:LATEST: Could not find metadata io.quarkus:quarkus-update-recipes/maven-metadata.xml in local 

### Expected behavior

update my project to quarkus 3

### Actual behavior

An error happens and the update does not take place

### How to Reproduce?

install quarkus cli 3.0.0.CR2 with sdkman:
1. `sdk install quarkus 3.0.0.CR2`
verify version of quarkus cli is 3.0.0.CR2
2. `quarkus -v`
create new quarkus app with default settings (2.16.6.Final at the time of writing):
3. `quarkus create app`
maven install just to be sure that this is not the issue
4. `mvn install`
run quarkus update command:
5. `quarkus update --stream=3.0`

In my case I get the following error:

quarkus update --stream=3.0
[INFO] Error stacktraces are turned on.
[INFO] Scanning for projects...
[INFO] 
[INFO] ---------------------< org.acme:code-with-quarkus >---------------------

[INFO]   from pom.xml
[INFO] --------------------------------[ jar ]---------------------------------
